page.title: 20EDUCATION IN AYLESBURY
page.content: There are educational facilities at all levels in Aylesbury.There is one nursery school, eleven first, nine middle and five first and middle combined schools. The children go to primary school until they are twelve and then to a Grammar or Secondary Modern School until at least 16. Aylesbury is in a selective grammar school area and the children sit a twelve plus exam in their fourth year in Middle School. The children then go into the second year at their next school. There are three Grammar Schools, a boys, a girls and a mixed and three mixed Secondary Modern Schools. Many of these open at night for a wide range of evening classes. The college offers courses in catering, hairdressing and secretarial but also acts as a Sixth Form College for A level students.
